org.eso.ias.plugin.filter

Class NoneFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eso.ias.plugin.filter.FilterBase
      • org.eso.ias.plugin.filter.NoneFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public class NoneFilter
extends FilterBase
    Default implementation of a filter: it does nothing but returning the value of the last acquired sample
    Author:
    acaproni
